Posts.Content: Apr 12, 2012 10:58PM javert2 wrote: MizMarie, Â So proud for you! It is so liberating to be free from the wigs and hats! I finally took the plunge when a friend of mine saw me "topless" and said, "Why do you wear a wig? I like you better this way." Then, once I did it, I wondered why I waited so long. Just own it and be proud because it symbolizes the battle you're fighting. God bless!
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53

Posts.Content: Apr 12, 2012 09:13PM javert2 wrote: Caitlin B., My hair started to grow back in during Taxol. I was really surprised by it. I first noticed the "peach fuzz" about 2 months after my last AC. It grew at about 1/2 inch per month and is now at my shoulders (15 months after treatment). Hang in there! ((hugs to you))
